enb_long_title: Eighth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: The Secretariat presented a paper proposing an integrated approach to the COP and MOP sessions.
The EU, Canada, Australia and Japan, opposed by Slovenia, supported one combined session for the sake of efficiency, noting that some details needed clarification.
The US stressed the need to ensure that its contributions were used to support the UNFCCC process.
The SBI adopted conclusions (FCCC/SBI/2002/L.16 and Add.1).
